name: Spark'nBounce
description:
Spark'n Bounce is an action-platformer where you bounce around to defeat a Boss. Use the recoil of your shoot to bounce back on the ground and get closer to the boss.

Everytime you hit the boss, it moves up. The only way to defeat it is to make him move all the way to the top.  But it won't be that easy !

Length : 2 to 5 minutes

Press the shoot button right before you're about to hit the ground to bounce higher !

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

I made this game alone in 16 days, every asset was made for this game except the music. I wanted to make a modern version of the arcade game Donkey Kong 3. While fiddling with the physics I found the bouncing mechanic interesting so I rolled with it ! 

Music used : Abandoned Town - Final Fantasy Crystal Chronicles : Ring of Fates

Made with Unity 2019.3

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Game Controls :

Controller  (recommended ):

  • Left Stick : Move
  • A : Shoot
  • A ( hold ) : Charge a super shot
  • F1 : Restart the game when you die

Mouse & Keyboard :

  • A-D : Move
  • Right Click or Up Arrow : Shoot
  • Right Click or Up Arrow ( hold ) : Charge a super shot
  • F1 : Restart the game when you die
